block.p: Catherine Christie Neuger, the daughter of the Rev. Dr. Christie Cozad Neuger and Win J. Neuger, of both New York and Minneapolis, is to be married today to Gregg Anthony LeBlanc, the son of Regina M. and Roger G. LeBlanc of Waltham, Mass. The bride's mother, a Methodist minister, will perform the ceremony at the Memorial United Methodist Church in White Plains.
The couple, both 25, graduated from Colby College, where they met.

Catherine Christie Neuger, the daughter of the Rev. Dr. Christie Cozad Neuger and Win J. Neuger, of both New York and Minneapolis, is to be married today to Gregg Anthony LeBlanc, the son of Regina M. and Roger G. LeBlanc of Waltham, Mass. The bride's mother, a Methodist minister, will perform the ceremony at the Memorial United Methodist Church in White Plains.
The couple, both 25, graduated from Colby College, where they met.

The bride is a senior research analyst for Kroll Associates, the New York corporate investigative services company. Her father is a senior vice president and the chief investment officer of American International Group, the New York insurance company. Her mother is the professor of pastoral care and pastoral theology at United Theological Seminary of the Twin Cities, which is in New Brighton, Minn.

The bridegroom is a financial analyst at PriceWaterhouseCoopers, the New York accounting business. His mother is the office manager at the Bergeron Company, a hardware manufacturer in Waltham. His father is a sergeant detective for the Waltham Police Department.
